channel.title: Help
channel.description:
trying to make a server... i dont know where to start
someone wanna help me run it, and ill make you co-owner

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @minikiller minikiller
item.description:
@minikiller wrote:

go to youtube and search for “How to make a 508 server”. When i first made one i took a vid with commentary. hope i helped =)

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @iKilem iKilem
item.description:
@iKilem wrote:

[quote=“ghdork, post:9, topic:301921”][quote author=iKilem link=topic=398257.msg2955215#msg2955215 date=1252787811]
I can help you make your own server (you developing it instead of others).

If your unsure of what to do, just ask for help on that.
[/quote]

thats pretty much what i want
i need someone to coach me through EVERYTHING on making a server.
those “HOW TO” tthreads dont help me at all[/quote]

Ok fine. I’m assuming you need help on developing and hosting a server right? I can help, but not right now unfortunately. I can speak to you tommorrow via PM if you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

I could help you, because I have made a bunch of servers myself, but one thing, what kind of server are you talking about? 317, 508+? Because I am learning some basic coding and i do alot of experiments too! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2009, 03:05:30 pm[/size][hr]also i have a no-ip account (which you will need)

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @ghdork ghdork
item.description:
@ghdork wrote:

[quote=“iKilem, post:6, topic:301921”]You want someone to develop a server for you, so you can make them admin? It doesn’t work like that lol.

The only thing you can offer really is money.[/quote][quote=“iKilem, post:6, topic:301921”]You want someone to develop a server for you, so you can make them admin? It doesn’t work like that lol.

The only thing you can offer really is money.[/quote]

so not even you can help?
theres no more of those extra nice ppl?

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @iKilem iKilem
item.description:
@iKilem wrote:

You want someone to develop a server for you, so you can make them admin? It doesn’t work like that lol.

The only thing you can offer really is money.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @ghdork ghdork
item.description:
@ghdork wrote:

[quote=“iKilem, post:4, topic:301921”]Well, no one will code anything for you or host for you unless you give something back in return.

If you can’t, you either learn how to code and host a server youself, or give up.[/quote]

i offer co-ownership/admin
or w/e you may want/need

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @iKilem iKilem
item.description:
@iKilem wrote:

Well, no one will code anything for you or host for you unless you give something back in return.

If you can’t, you either learn how to code and host a server youself, or give up.
